TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 在设计时提供一个 HTML 颜色字符串生成器，供用户选择颜色使用。

span.span: Provides an HTML color string builder at design time that allows a user to select a color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会启动用于选择颜色值的用户界面。The method starts a user interface for selecting a color value. 类不用于在设计时环境之外使用。The class is not intended for use outside of the design time environment. 需要，即在设计时通常可在 Web 窗体项目中。 requires the , which is typically available within a Web Forms project at design time. 如果你想要生成 HTML 颜色字符串，你可能想要实现的方法，将转换的 RGB 值为 HTML 兼容 RRGGBB 格式字符串的对象。If you want to build HTML color strings, you may want to implement a method that converts the RGB values of a object to an HTML-compatible RRGGBB format string. 如果你想要使用控件选择一种颜色，或者配置一种颜色，可以为此，生成用户界面或者你可能想要使用控件可用于编辑具有默认值的属性提供颜色选择接口。If you intend to use a control to select a color or configure a color, you can build a user interface for this, or you may want to use a control which allows you to edit properties with the default providing a color selection interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildColor (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialColor);
.method public static hidebysig string BuildColor(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function BuildColor (component As IComponent, owner As Control, initialColor As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ BuildColor(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ owner, System::String ^ initialColor);

param.name: component
param.span: 将使用其站点来访问设计时服务的 。

span.span: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.

param.name: owner
param.span: 用作选择器窗口的父级的 。

span.span: The used to parent the picker window.

param.name: initialColor
param.span: 将在选择器窗口中显示的初始颜色，为有效的 HTML 颜色格式。

span.span: The initial color to be shown in the picker window, in a valid HTML color format.

summary.span: 启动颜色编辑器以生成 HTML 颜色属性值。

span.span: Starts a color editor to build an HTML color property value.

returns.span: 表示为 HTML 颜色格式字符串的颜色值，或者如果未能检索到生成器服务，则为 。

span.span: The color value, represented as a string in an HTML color format, or if the builder service could not be retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串，如果其他比`null`，该值指示一种颜色有效的 HTML 颜色格式。The returned string, if other than `null`, indicates a color in a valid HTML color format. 有效格式包括 RGB 格式 (#RRGGBB) 中的指定的颜色和颜色代码。Valid formats include named colors and color codes in RGB format (#RRGGBB). ## Examples [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]
